Adam dengan Shah juga bertengkar sebab Shah diketahui dia keluar dengan Ana, sedangkan dia ada kekasih. Apa pun mereka bertiga masih bersama dalam mengesan lembaga baju di perkarangan rumah Sabariah. Mereka dapat mengesan tetapi lembaga baju itu menyerang merekabertiga dan menghilang diri.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep17
programme.desc: Memaparkan Ana menolak pujukan semula Shah. Shah yang masih berduka juga menolak untuk mencari lembaga drama. Daniel dan Adam meneruskan misi mengesan lembaga drama. Sementara itu ibu Nur bersama Azman melawat Nur.Kebetulan Bad yang ada di wad itu, dia buat tidak kisah lalu beredar dari situ. Dia pula mengorak langkah untuk mencari seorang kekasih baru yang lebih muda. Nur walau pun terasa kehilangan Shah tetapi dia tidak tunjukkan. Setelah mendapat maklumat daripada dua orang pemandu teksi, kedua Adam dan Daniel meneruskan misi dan Bad telah juga merestui mereka. Sementara itu Bad agak cemburu terhadap jandanya dan sibuk cuba berkenalan dengan beberapa wanita muda melalui telefon pintarnya. Nur juga mengharapkan ibunya tidak meneruskan persahabatan dengan Azman yang lebih muda, tetapi ibunya tidak pedulikan. Sementara itu usaha Daniel dan Adam termasuk mendapat nasihat tetapi masih belum berjaya mengesan lembaga drama.

programme.title: Ong Bak 3
programme.desc: Kisah pahlawan Tien, yang telah ditangkap oleh panglima perang yang kejam Tuan Rajasena. Tien melarikan diri daripada cengkaman Rajasena, pulih daripada kecederaannya yang melumpuhkan dengan bantuan Guru Bua, dan kembali untuk berhadapan dengan Bhuti Sangkha, yang telah menggantikan Rajasena sebagai penjahat utama.

programme.title: Bangkok Knock Out
programme.desc: Sekumpulan kawan "kelab pertarungan", yang gayanya berbeza dari Muay Thai, Capoeira hingga Kung Fu dan Tai Chi, mesti bergabung tenaga dan berjuang untuk nyawa mereka dalam menyelamatkan seorang rakan yang diculik.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Comrade Tanthai(Chatchai Plengpanich) an infamous and highly professional hit man accepts a new assignment from Chaba(Bongkuch Kongmalai),ex-lover of high-ranking mafia honcho, Wong (Thanit Jatanukul). The assignment is to find and kill the drug lord and Godfather of Chinatown, Leemeng(Nirud Sirijanya). Leemeng's death opens up a conflict between the mafia of both the official and unofficial kind. Everyone is now after Tanthai no matter what the cost.

programme.title: Alam Puaka Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Kisah-kisah yang dipaparkan di dalam siri ini adalah berdasarkan daripada penceritaan masyarakat umum. Ianya dilakonkan secara fiksyen dan sebarang penambahan tidak berkaitan dengan sesiapa samada hidup atau telah meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Mother Gamer
programme.desc: Untuk menghalang anak lelaki kesayangannya yang menyertai kejohanan E-sukan, dia memutuskan untuk menubuhkan pasukannya sendiri untuk mengalahkannya dan menghapuskan impiannya untuk menjadi pemain permainan profesional.

programme.title: Losmen Melati Ep 1
programme.desc: Di pinggir Jawa, Indonesia, pengembara dari dekat dan jauh meninjau sesuatu yang aneh dan misteri. sebuah keluarga yang mencari tempat tinggal selepas pengebumian nenek mereka dan pasangan muda bercinta mencari tempat untuk bermalam bersama. Walau bagaimanapun, perkara-perkara tidak seperti yang mereka nampak di losmen

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Filem ini bermula dengan dua orang anak, Nam-yi dan adik perempuannya Ja-in, dikejar oleh pengawal Raja Injo dan diselamatkan oleh bapa mereka Choi Pyeong-ryung, seorang pegawai Raja Gwanghae dan seorang pemanah yang mahir. Dia menghantar anak-anaknya untuk mencari tempat perlindungan dengan kawan baiknya Kim Mu-seon. Semasa mereka melarikan diri, Ja-in merayu abangnya untuk kembali kepada bapa mereka, tetapi Choi Pyeong-ryung dibunuh di hadapan Nam-yi. Nam-yi, walaupun digigit oleh anjing pengawal, membunuh mereka dan melarikan diri bersama Ja-in.

programme.title: Colombiana
programme.desc: Pada tahun 1992, di Bogota, Colombia, baron dadah Don Luis Sandoval menghantar penguatkuasanya Marco dan sekumpulan lelaki bersenjata untuk membunuh rakan sekutunya Fabio Restrepo dan keluarganya kerana Fabio telah menentangnya dengan cuba meninggalkan kehidupan jenayahnya. Fabio memberikan anak perempuannya yang berusia sembilan tahun, Cataleya, kad memori komputer SmartMedia yang dimuatkan dengan maklumat mengenai perniagaan Don Luis dan memberitahunya itu adalah "pasport"nya; dia juga memberikan alamat bapa saudaranya Emilio di Chicago, yang akan menjaganya. Akhirnya, dia meninggalkannya dengan kalung orkid cataleya ibunya. Selepas Fabio dan isterinya Alicia ditembak mati, Cataleya melarikan diri dan mencari suaka di Kedutaan A.S. Dia diberikan laluan ke Amerika Syarikat selepas menyerahkan kad memori kepada kakitangan kedutaan. Walaupun pegawai Amerika cuba memindahkannya ke dalam sistem jagaan angkat, Cataleya menjejaki bapa saudaranya di Chicago dan memintanya melatihnya sebagai pembunuh.

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: Alam Puaka Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Kisah-kisah yang dipaparkan di dalam siri ini adalah berdasarkan daripada penceritaan masyarakat umum. Ianya dilakonkan secara fiksyen dan sebarang penambahan tidak berkaitan dengan sesiapa samada hidup atau telah meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Gemilang
programme.desc: Julia merupakan seorang penyanyi yang mencapai kejayaan di atas sokongan seorang hartawan bernama Razlan. Rita, teman baik Julia pula merupakan seorang artis terkenal dan menganggap Julia sebagai sumber inspirasinya. Julia merasakan keselamatan dirinya terancam apabila gerak-gerinya sering diawasi oleh seorang lelaki misteri.

programme.title: Shakilla
programme.desc: Pasangan penyanyi popular, Ray dan Yasmin mengikat kontrak dengan sebuah hotel terkemuka. Ray sering diganggu peminatnya, Shakila yang tidak pernah bersua muka dengannya. Gangguan Shakila itu memberi ilham kepada Ray untuk menggubah sebuah lagu. Perubahan sikap Ray telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu Yasmin sehingga mendorongnya untuk membunuh Shakila.

programme.title: Kami
programme.desc: Dua sahabat keluar mencari rezeki yang lebih baik di bandar melalui pelbagai dugaan kehidupan bersama. Tookoo yang berhasrat ingin menjadi seorang penyanyi lari daripada rumah untuk bebas dari keluarganya. Din pula yang masih budak, sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi sesuap nasi. Persahabatan yang terjalin makin erat sambil mereka mengharungi liku kehidupan.

programme.title: Kolej 56
programme.desc: Berdepan jurang kefahaman, Rosman harus mencari jalan bagaimana untuk bersama gadis yang dicintainya. Menuntut pelajaran di sebuah kolej swasta, Rosman menjalin persahabatan bersama Roslan, Rosli dan Tengku Kamil. Golongan kelas yang berbeza tidak menghalang mereka untuk bersahabat. Satu kejadian telah menemukan Roslan bersama Mawar. Perasaan cinta mula berputik namun berdepan kesukaran kerana berbeza kepercayaan.

programme.title: Bintang Pujaan
programme.desc: Perhubungan cinta antara Rina dan Hassan bersemarak kembali apabila mereka bertemu di kelab malam sehingga membawa ke jinjang pelamin dan mendapat seorang anak. Rina menjadi suri rumahtangga dan meninggalkan pekerjaannya sebagai penyanyi. Kepincangan keluarga dan perubahan hidup berlaku apabila Hassan tercedera dan tidak dapat meneruskan Peterman. Rina kembali ke dunia kelab malam walaupun tidak mendapat restu Hassan dan mula bersikap angkuh dan melupakan tanggungjawabnya.

programme.title: Gemilang
programme.desc: Julia merupakan seorang penyanyi yang mencapai kejayaan di atas sokongan seorang hartawan bernama Razlan. Rita, teman baik Julia pula merupakan seorang artis terkenal dan menganggap Julia sebagai sumber inspirasinya. Julia merasakan keselamatan dirinya terancam apabila gerak-gerinya sering diawasi oleh seorang lelaki misteri.

programme.title: Getaran
programme.desc: Awie memiliki sebuah bengkel di sebuah kawasan setinggan. Dalam masa yang sama, di kawasan itu terdapat satu kumpulan muzik yang dianggotai oleh sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka kumpulan Kristal. Awie ingin mengetengahkan bakat mereka namun satu insiden telah berlaku ketika dia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Mona yang mengakibatkan dirinya hilang ingatan. Dapatkah Mona memulihkan ingatan Awie dan menyambung perjuangannya bersama kumpulan Kristal?

programme.title: Dendang Remaja
programme.desc: Di sebuah akademi seni, terdapat dua kumpulan pelajar yang berseteru. Mereka tidak serius ketika belajar dan lebih menggemari muzik dari barat. Oleh kerana tidak mendapat bimbingan yang sewajarnya, para pelajar ini menjadi semakin liar sehingga menganggu ketenteraman.

programme.title: Gemilang
programme.desc: Julia merupakan seorang penyanyi yang mencapai kejayaan di atas sokongan seorang hartawan bernama Razlan. Rita, teman baik Julia pula merupakan seorang artis terkenal dan menganggap Julia sebagai sumber inspirasinya. Julia merasakan keselamatan dirinya terancam apabila gerak-gerinya sering diawasi oleh seorang lelaki misteri.

programme.title: Aku Ada Kau Ada
programme.desc: Nordin Ahmad pelajar tahun kedua sering teringin dipandang cool sentiasa. Namun, setiap kali Nordin menjadi tumpuan, dia akan panik, mula batuk dan akhirnya muntah. Aziz pula, seorang pelajar poyo yang perasan popular, selalu menyakat Nordin. Tina pula pelajar yang baru bertukar ke kolej Nordin untuk 99 Hari Senyum, sebuah program khas untuk mengatasi sikap panas baran yang ditawarkan oleh Dr. Zida, kaunselor.

programme.title: Kami
programme.desc: Dua sahabat keluar mencari rezeki yang lebih baik di bandar melalui pelbagai dugaan kehidupan bersama. Tookoo yang berhasrat ingin menjadi seorang penyanyi lari daripada rumah untuk bebas dari keluarganya. Din pula yang masih budak, sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi sesuap nasi. Persahabatan yang terjalin makin erat sambil mereka mengharungi liku kehidupan.

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Shakilla
programme.desc: Pasangan penyanyi popular, Ray dan Yasmin mengikat kontrak dengan sebuah hotel terkemuka. Ray sering diganggu peminatnya, Shakila yang tidak pernah bersua muka dengannya. Gangguan Shakila itu memberi ilham kepada Ray untuk menggubah sebuah lagu. Perubahan sikap Ray telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu Yasmin sehingga mendorongnya untuk membunuh Shakila.

programme.title: Tipu Kanan Tipu Kiri
programme.desc: Rudy yang berkahwin dengan selebriti superstar Wulan, mesti merahsiakan perkahwinan mereka kerana klausa dalam kontrak Wulan yang menyatakan dia tidak boleh berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya mendapat pekerjaan di sebuah syarikat dan secara tidak sengaja memberitahu bahawa dia sudah berkahwin. Apabila bosnya ingin berjumpa dengan isterinya, Rudy mengupah seorang wanita berpura-pura menjadi isterinya dan keadaan perlahan-lahan menjadi tidak terkawal.

programme.title: Kolej 56
programme.desc: Berdepan jurang kefahaman, Rosman harus mencari jalan bagaimana untuk bersama gadis yang dicintainya. Menuntut pelajaran di sebuah kolej swasta, Rosman menjalin persahabatan bersama Roslan, Rosli dan Tengku Kamil. Golongan kelas yang berbeza tidak menghalang mereka untuk bersahabat. Satu kejadian telah menemukan Roslan bersama Mawar. Perasaan cinta mula berputik namun berdepan kesukaran kerana berbeza kepercayaan.

programme.title: Mawar Merah
programme.desc: Kartika atau Arti gadis Jakarta yang suka bersosial. Tetapi ibu bapa Kartika tidak suka perangai Kartika yang liar dan suka bersosial. Mereka memutuskan Arti akan dihantar ke Kuala Lumpur untuk dijaga oleh nenek Arti dan bapa saudaranya, Sofyan. Hubungan Arti dan Sofyan semakin rapat dan mereka berdua saling jatuh cinta.Sofyan pula cuba menyembunyikan perasaannya kerana tahu perasaan cintanya terhadap Arti adalah dilarang agama walaupun Arti juga mencintainya. Mereka berdua terpaksa menerima hakikat dan takdir percintaan mereka

programme.title: Getaran
programme.desc: Awie memiliki sebuah bengkel di sebuah kawasan setinggan. Dalam masa yang sama, di kawasan itu terdapat satu kumpulan muzik yang dianggotai oleh sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka kumpulan Kristal. Awie ingin mengetengahkan bakat mereka namun satu insiden telah berlaku ketika dia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Mona yang mengakibatkan dirinya hilang ingatan. Dapatkah Mona memulihkan ingatan Awie dan menyambung perjuangannya bersama kumpulan Kristal?

programme.title: Marah - Marah Sayang
programme.desc: Tiga jejaka yang cintakan muzik terpaksa dilepaskan dari kerja masing-masing kerana asyik leka dibuai irama ketika sedang bekerja yang menyebabkan ketidakselesaan orang lain. Rostam, Roslan dan Rosdin mula jatuh cinta terhadap tiga anak dara yang cantik namun Salina, Sarina dan Satina menolak cinta mereka. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan oleh mereka dan akhirnya mereka berjaya mengahwini gadis-gadis pilihan mereka itu. Syarat-syarat telah diberi jika ingin berkahwin namun telah dilanggar, ini telah mengakibatkan perkahwinan mereka menjadi kucar-kacir

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@12
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Rezeki Api Ep10
programme.desc: Fokus kulinari, dari dapur kayu kampung hingga peniaga bandar. Teknik api unik, suku kaum, kulinari bumi kenyalang. Lengkap tema semulajadi: air, tanah, udara (angin), & api.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Lombak Rindok Go Ep13
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan realiti yang memukau, menggabungkan elemen perjuangan, kerjasama, dan strategi dalam sebuah perlumbaan yang mendebarkan dari awal hingga akir.

programme.title: Ajaib Ep2
programme.desc: Dunia koma Jasmin dan mimpi Maliq mempertemukan mereka dalam satu dunia lain, yang akhirnya membuatkan mereka menjalinkan cinta. Pertemuan di dunia fantasi, akhirnya menyatukan mereka di dunia realiti

programme.title: Staycation With Fattah Ep11
programme.desc: An intriguing show promoting unveiling brand new and existing homestays around Sarawak while curating a magical staycation experience for the audience.

programme.title: Running Man S2 Ep17
programme.desc: "Running Man", popular South Korean variety show that blends reality television and comedy, airing since 2010. It features a regular cast of celebrity hosts and weekly guest stars participating in.

programme.title: Kompilasi Muzik Video Raya Ep1
programme.desc: Kompilasi Lagu-Lagu Raya yang terbaik sepanjang zaman

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@4:55
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Aroma Sungkei S2 Ep27

programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Ehsan Love Story
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki tampan bernama Sian yang berasal dari Utara Thailand. Sian dibesarkan oleh ibunya selepas kematian bapanya. Sian yang baru habis belajar menunggu kepulangan teman wanitanya bernama Som yang belajar di Bangkok.

programme.title: Surga Ditelapak Kaki Ibu Tiri
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Bundo yang terpisah jarak dengan anak tunggalnya, Denay yang belajar di Jakarta. Kerana sangat merindukan anaknya, Bundo berangkat ke Jakarta, tetapi Denay sudah berubah.

programme.title: Berkah Di Akhir Hayat Anakku
programme.desc: Sejak Putri disambar kilat, dia sering melihat perkara ghaib dan boleh melihat sesuatu perkara yang akan terjadi. Bagaimanakah kisah Putri selanjutnya?

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep3
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: Mak, Adib Pulang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Adib seorang anak yatim piatu, diambil oleh sebuah keluarga dan dijadikan anak angkat. Adib merasakan dia telah mengkhianati ibunya sehingga menyebabkan dia lari balik ke rumah ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Tmo Jangan Ambil Nyawa Aku
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Jangan Ambil Nyawa Aku

programme.title: Filem 11:11:Apa Yang Kau Lihat?
programme.desc: Pada suatu malam pada pukul 11:11 tepat, Galih, seorang pelajar arkeologi yang suka menyelam dan fotografi, menemui keberadaan Dewi, ibunya. Dewi menghilangkan diri ketika Galih masih kecil di sebuah pulau terpencil bernama Tanjung Biru.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Takbir Semalam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Mak Yah terkenal dengan sikap yang suka memaki hamun dan bercakap kasar. Tahun ini merupakan tahun pertama bagi Mak Yah untuk menyambut Hari Raya seorang diri. Orang kampung sedih melihat Mak Yah kerana dia masih lagi belum boleh menerima hakikat kerana semua ini berlaku di atas sikapnya yang sering memarahi anak menantunya sehingga mereka sekeluarga nekad keluar dari rumah dan terlibat dengan kemalangan yang meragut nyawa mereka semua.

programme.title: Cendera Kasih
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang ditinggalkan isterinya akibat perbuatan ibunya sendiri berjumpa semula dengan isterinya apabila ditugaskan menguruskan projek di kedah . Lelaki yang masih sayangkan isteri dan anaknya itu merayu supaya isterinya pulang ke pangkuannya

programme.title: Tiba Saatnya Membuka Hati Bos Galak Satu Ini
programme.desc: Pada hari pertama kerja, Ghea terpaksa berjalan dalam hujan sehingga dia akhirnya mengambil payung orang tak dikenali. Ternyata, payung itu milik Rey yang merupakan bos restoran tempat Ghea akan ditemuduga. Sementara itu, kekasih Ghea, Ardan rupanya berselingkuh dengan Geby, kakak Ghea. Rey cuba menenangkan Ghea yang sedih.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep44
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: Herb
programme.desc: A 20-year-old woman with mild mental disorder falls in love with a policeman but must face heartbreak when she is forced to deal with certain realities about herself and those around her.

programme.title: The King's Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International

programme.title: Single In Seoul

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: A Year-End Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: The Pirates

programme.title: The King's Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: The Moon
programme.desc: An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely...

programme.title: Tazza: The Hidden Card
programme.desc: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor

programme.title: Actionhero

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Love+Sling

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep17
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2171
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep3
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her fathers underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macaus economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This intriguing wuxia saga is packed with conspiracies, power schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres around the struggle for underworld supremacy between two clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts Worlds intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but he forgives Qi after knowing Qis guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lins husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.desc: Tamil Political Thriller Film, Starring, Vijay Devarakonda, Mehrene Kaur Pirzada, Yashika Aannand, Nassar, Sanchana Natarajan & Others

programme.desc: The children of secret-agent parents must save them from danger.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ya Win Some, Ya Luge Some - The Racers participate in the Wacky Winter Games and compete in the luge, ski-jump, slalom, and snowboarding events. The games culminate in a final competition where Dastardly and Muttley do a dance.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mambo-Itali-Go-Go - Racers try to race across the idyllic Tuscan countryside, where they discover that too much hospitality isn't always a good thing.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep3
programme.desc: So Far To Mardi Gras - The Wackies, joined by guest racer Pandora Pitstop, race customized watercrafts through the Louisiana Swamps.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Easter Express - The residents of Easter Island celebrate an ancient festival with a Wacky Race. The Racers end up rousing a giant alien menace that awakens the slumbering Easter Island statues bent on conquering the world, unless Muttley can stop them.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Race-A-Lot - Medieval Camelot has never been so exciting, or so wacky!

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Peter Imperfect - Peter and Dastardly are caught in the explosion of I.Q.'s latest invention. Peter loses his 'mojo' but Dastardly has absorbed Peter's perfection and refuses to give it up.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Yes, We Canyon - On vacation, the Racers competitive attitudes overwhelm each other and they end up destroying the Grand Canyon.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Roamin' Racers - Our racers take the roles of ancient Roman chariot racers during the very wacky version of the Roman Games.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Smokey And The Racers - The Racers race through the American Deep South until they run afoul of Dastardly's cousin, Sheriff Longarm D. Lawe. Captured by speed traps, the Racers are sentenced to 847 years in jail and must find a way to escape and finish the race.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Raceketeers - Penelope, Peter, Tiny and Bella take the roles of the Three Musketeers in a wacky and action packed version of The Man in the Iron Mask.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Fantastic Race - Shrunk to microscopic size the Racers are accidentally injected by Dastardly and must race through his circulatory system to find a way out before they enlarge inside him.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Backseat Drivers - Racers have always been curious about the mysterious Doombuggy, in which the Gruesome Twosome apparently live in the trunk. The Racers sneak inside and are trapped in a gigantic Halloween wonderland and pursued by various familiar monsters.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Space Race - A thousand years in the future, the Wacky Races are alive and well, and even wackier!

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Off Track - Peter and his friends race back to Peter's hometown of Perfectville and find it wasn't so perfect after all.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Cave Racers - A trip back in time reveals the very first Wacky Race.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Guru My Dreams - With the help of a very unusual spiritual adviser, the Racers find themselves racing through their collective unconscious dream world encountering their fondest fantasies, or in the case of Dastardly, a deeply screwed up mess of a psyche.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Cold Rush - Before a race to the South Pole, Peter challenges Dastardly to win just one race fair and square.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep18
programme.desc: It's A Wacky Life - During a Wacky Races Christmas party, Dastardly triggers his latest tricks and finds himself in Heaven reviewing his past misdeeds with a familiar angel named Melvin.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Pretzel Logic - Dastardly's Bavarian cousin Desdemona captures the Racers during a competition over the Alps and locks them in her pretzel mines. Are our racers doomed to dig salty snacks forever or can Penelope save the boys from a high carb fate?

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Dashing Thru The Snow - During a race to the North Pole, the racers accidentally run over Santa Claus and now must take his place to save Christmas.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Formula Racing - The Racers are turned into babies and Dastardly is stuck as their babysitter. Babies or not, the need for speed is an undeniable urge, much to Dastardly's regret.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Unraceable - Dastardly is banned by race owner P.T. Barnstorm from racing for habitual and dangerous cheating. Dastardly is forced to go to an employment agency and take a number of other jobs, all of which he is comically unsuited for.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Sister Twister - Pandora switches places with her twin sister Penny in order to steal a prize for good sportsmanship and fair play.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Mars Needs Racers - P.T. Barnstorm's latest money making race event sends the racers off to race on Mars against an evil space tyrant with Earth as the prize.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Race To The Bottom - As the race continues through the center of the earth to the Land That Time Forgot, the Racers are attacked by dinosaurs but are rescued at the last second by a tribe of Mole People.

programme.title: An American Girl: Chrissa Stands Strong
programme.desc: When Chrissa moves to a new school in the middle of the year, she is greeted by the girls in her fourth-grade class with teasing and tricks.

programme.title: A Waltons' Thanksgiving
programme.desc: The Walton family prepares for the Harvest Festival Fair in town. But this year, a young boy arrives that will dramatically change the Waltons' lives.

programme.desc: An outrageously insane new game show of puzzles and brainteasers for kids to play on television.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 06
programme.desc: At an antique store, Michael shows off an impossible way to organize your clothes, and back at the supermarket we find out that there are some serious surprises lurking in our favorite foods. Finally, at the Navy Yard, Michael pushes his skills to the limit when he attempts one of his most ambitious feats yet - tricking two people at the same time!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 08
programme.desc: In this special crossover event, the Impractical Jokers help Michael stun coffee bar customers - but soon discover the joke is on them! Plus, Michael's woodland creatures display fantastic hidden abilities.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 09
programme.desc: Michael is back in Chicago to hash out new ideas in a hemp store, but it's not until he inspects a spooky church that people start getting stoned, literally. Plus, Michael teams up with special guest star, Jack Black!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 10
programme.desc: Michael shows some unsuspecting shoppers how to manipulate solid objects, and he reveals the truth behind how automatic vacuums work. Plus, one employee's shift at a camping store becomes very colorful - and confusing.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: In this competitive episode Sal, Joe, Q, and Murr battle head-to-head in fierce Joker vs. Joker challenges! The guys go two-on-two as they conduct focus groups where they focus mostly on making things uncomfortable. They pitch fabulous and tasty mascot ideas to diehard baseball fans. Then, Joe and Q, break-it-down old-school-style at the mall. And finally, Sal and Murr face-off in a challenge that literally proves neither is book smart.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 3
programme.desc: Murr, Sal, Q, and Joe share secrets with shoppers in a grocery store, but when one shopper has a history with Murr the embarrassment escalates to a whole new level! Then, the guys get creative in an art store, and convince New Yorkers to be featuredin their wacky blogs. And tonight's big loser heads to the airport with a travel itinerary that would make anyone nauseous.

Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 03
programme.desc: Amy records Sheldon talking in his sleep and tries to convince him he can be more easygoing.Meanwhile Raj and Stuart compete to win the heart of Bernadette's coworker.

programme.title: Friends S3 12
programme.desc: Ross becomes jealous when he thinks he catches Rachel's new co-worker flirting with her.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 11
programme.desc: At Michael's fireworks stand, he's got everything from exploding fruit to levitation sparklers. And at a Hemp store, Michael shows off his innovations in hemp technology. Plus, a time capsule completely blows one man's mind!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 7
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Sal and Q network their way into some very uncomfortable business conversations, and go head to head in a photography presentation that's anything but picture perfect. programme.desc: Raised by gorillas in a remote part of Africa, Tarzan must protect his jungle and Jane from greedy New York City businessmen who want to destroy his jungle home for profit in this stunning CGI-animated family adventure.

programme.title: Framed By My Sister
programme.desc: The families of twin sisters are infiltrated by a mysterious triplet, who was separated from them at birth by their adopted mother. She frames one of the twins for murdering the other's husband and then assumes the identity of the widow. Can she succeed?

programme.title: Bad Influence
programme.desc: A single mom is overjoyed when her daughter finally makes friends at her new high school. Soon, however, it becomes clear that this group of students follows their own moral code thats strange, self-centered, and possibly dangerous.

programme.title: August: Osage County
programme.desc: Meryl Streep and Julia Roberts lead an all-star cast. A family crisis unites a dispersed group of siblings at the Oklahoma house they grew up in with the dysfunctional woman who raised them.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Fresh Water - The remarkable animal drama in fresh water, the lifeblood of our planet.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S2 Ep5
programme.desc: We open the doors to one of the world's most advanced electric taxis. How do American footballs withstand the equivalent force of 200 newtons? In France, a cosmetic line relies on high tech robotic automation and China continues to produce a childhood favourite in epic proportions.

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Gallipoli to the Syrian Border - Simon visits Istanbul and the beaches and crystal clear waters of the Aegean Sea before ending up at the war-torn border with Syria.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Joanna travels the length of India, showing us delights like the flower-sellers of Madurai, before taking us back to Uzbekistan for gory tales and gem making.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Discover how roasted eggplants are transformed into rich and yummy baba ghanoush; apple strudel is hand braided into a flaky, buttery treat; creamy ranch dressing gets its distinctively tangy flavour; and soft, sweet and how chewy chocolate chip cookies are produced.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Discover how festive eggnog gets its rich and creamy, soothing texture; pre-assembled gingerbread houses are built on a spicy foundation of aromatic dough and icing; sweet and luxurious milk chocolate is painstakingly formed into flavorful hollow chocolate Santas.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Discover how only a few simple ingredients produce the complex flavour of crumbly, buttery Scottish shortbread; moist cake and creamy mousse are rolled into Yule logs, a decadent holiday dessert; a secret ingredient is the crunch in a sweet and minty chocolate bark.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secrets of Success - The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Samira Ahmed reveals how Iran preserved its distinctive language and culture despite the Arab conquest of Persia.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep6
programme.desc: Azores - On Flores in the Azores, Ben meets a family who live off-grid in a cottage on a steep mountain.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Hunkering Down Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Highlands Ep7
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Sanctuary Ep5
programme.desc: Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Migration Ep6
programme.desc: Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter or a mate. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds even thousands of individuals.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories Ep1
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.desc: Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat 1 - Joey's Journey Ep2
programme.desc: Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, whos trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Anatomy Gone Wild Ep4
programme.desc: Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories Ep1
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3

programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Hunkering Down Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Wetlands Ep8
programme.desc: Wild Wild Easts wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blandings Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blandings can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Giant Creepy Crawlers Ep5
programme.desc: Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Crocodile Capers Ep6
programme.desc: Strap in for Dr. Amandas risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, whos headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Battle Lines Ep1
programme.desc: As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, whos honing her survival skills in Brazils Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Crustaceans Ep9
programme.desc: The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Camouflage and Colouration Ep6
programme.desc: Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Under Pressure Ep2
programme.desc: As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Wild Stallions of the Himalayas Ep3
programme.desc: The high altitude Ladakh plateau in northwest India is a land of extremes. The air is thin and the mountain landscape treacherous; winters are freezing, while summers are scorching hot. The Tibetan wild ass is king of these grasslands, and one old stallion has developed a way to stay one step ahead of his rivals. We follow Dorje as he shadows a herd of females and foals, from winter to summer, when he will get his chance to sire the next generation. But to win his prize he must eventually do battle with other stallions - all wanting his crown!

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - A Sloth Bear's Dilemma Ep4
programme.desc: In a land of searing summer heat and thunderous tropical storms, life for all that live on the plains of southern India is tough. But this year its harder than ever as the monsoon rains are late to arrive. For Bibi, a female sloth bear with two young cubs, this will be the biggest challenge of her life. With no rainfall, food will be hard to find and her cubs are also open to attack from leopards and other bears. Bibi must guide her family through this tricky time. Does she have the experience for them all to survive?

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Cornish king crab is on the menu for Rick as he heads out of Newquay to catch and cook this tasty crustacean. Afterwards, he takes a trip inland to Bodmin Moor to meet Robin Hanbury Tenison, one of the 20th century's last great explorers. His farm is home to one of Cornwall's most ambitious rewilding projects, where Robin's son, Merlin, has recently introduced a pair of wild beavers who are doing their best to restore biodiversity in this corner of Cornwall.

programme.desc: The Final - The three remaining bakers need to produce a carrot cake worthy of winning, come out tops in a technical based on a Belgian recipe and rustle up a showstopping banquet fit for the Mad Hatter's Tea Party.

programme.desc: Finale - The top three bakers battle it out to be crowned South Africa's Best Amateur Baker. programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Rick boards the ferry in Penzance to take him to the Isles of Scilly, a group of islands which were once part of Cornwall. This inspires Rick to cook a honey pudding with Cornish ice cream and a butterscotch sauce.
