programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2018
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2018 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep3
programme.desc: Brothers - When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo's treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer in Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep7
programme.desc: The Gray Matter / Fever Break - Oh and Tip discover an underground cult living in the sewers./While Tip is home with a fever, she witnesses a crime committed by her scheming neighbor, Donny.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep14
programme.desc: Gran The Unfriendly Ghost / Bad Sandy - Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep33
programme.desc: To Heather Or Not To Heather - When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out theres a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. programme.desc: Cyrano - Brian downloads some sketchy software that promises to make him cool. It works out great and everyones happy! (JK, its a huge disaster.)

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep16
programme.desc: Paradise Found - Sometimes you land on an unexplored planet and wonderful, magical things happen. Then after a while youre like, wait, is something wrong? Yes, something is definitely wrong.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep39
programme.desc: A New Defender - Victory is almost within reach of the Voltron Coalition, but after a setback has the team trapped, their only hope for survival comes in the most unexpected way

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep40
programme.desc: The Prisoner - Team Voltron grapples with whether or not they can trust Lotor

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep14
programme.desc: Show On The Road/Catherine The Great - Peabody and Sherman try to do the show in a new city but end up on the moon instead and must get home before astronauts take over the penthouse

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep15
programme.desc: Scrambled Eggs/George Stephenson - Sherman accidentally swaps a class project with a dinosaur egg that hatches on stage, so Peabody must help to send it back before it ruins the show

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep14
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle damage the largest birdbath in the world, they set out on a musical adventure to put on a benefit concert and raise the money needed to restore the birdbath.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep13
programme.desc: The Primrose Classic / The Blimpateers - A professional paper airplane thrower hires Archibald to be his caddie. While floating through the sky, Archibald bumps into birds who live in a blimp.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep14
programme.desc: The Mall Walkers / Treasured Tattoo - Archibald stumbles upon a crime in progress while trapped in the mall overnight. A whale's tattooed map inspires Archibald to go on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria Falls & Winters - When the watering hole at a Zimbabwean animal park dries up, Whitebeard sends the Wanderers to the scene with a rain-producing Weather Key; but when Odlulu gets a hold of the key, the Wanderers must pursue her through rain, fog, and snow to save those animals.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep6
programme.desc: Garby - Just as Ty Rux welcomes Garby, a loud and smelly Stegarbasaurus, to the crater, Revvit disappears and the gang embarks on a dangerous rescue mission.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Secret Deliveries - Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. Kind Noddy has a great idea and when Pat Pat makes her final delivery she finds a big pile of presents waiting for her from all her grateful friends. Thank you Pat Pat! And thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica... IN COLOR! - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep8
programme.desc: Tortools - The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep8
programme.desc: Wrinkly Humans People / Piggy Piggy - Tip doesn't think her grandparents will approve of Oh so he disguises himself as a humans housekeeper/Sharzod adopts Pig and names him Juicy Booty.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girls plans to attend the Governors Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math / Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise / Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep34
programme.desc: Stryke Out - Hiccup and Toothless are captured and must find a way to escape the Dragon Fighting arena and survive an attack from the fearsome Triple Stryke dragon.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do the Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesnt think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggies big moment going.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep139
programme.desc: Leaf Portraits - When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! // Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Secret Island / Astrobot - Lady Fluffpot visits a secret island with Steel to find a birthday present from her cousin Adventure Alex. // Muffin's plan to get Dinobot into trouble goes disastrously wrong when the pair get trapped with Lola in an out-of-control Space Shuttle.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Paddington and the Unlikely Hero / Paddington Needs a Hero - Who's the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens and why do they want to remain anonymous? // Paddington finds a four-legged hero when he gets stuck in an igloo at the winter festival.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cloud Surfer - Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Krazy Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebeccas paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Wild West Heroes - Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep717
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. The Bubblemaker - Super Wheels to the rescue! When the Bubblemaker starts trapping everything in his trouble bubbles, Blaze and Sparkle have to become superheroes to save Axle City!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger / Pups Save the Royal Armor - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington's Favourite Hero / Paddington And The Skateboarder - Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home. // Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. The Green Queen - The Green Queen is turning everything in Axle City... green! Luckily Blaze, Watts, and Darington can transform into superheroes! Can they stop The Green Queen before Axle City is one color forever?

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crystal Of Strength / Clamity - Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pony - Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pigs office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbits job is all about numbers, Mrs Cats job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pigs job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppas playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they cant see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Doors Galore / No Rules Day - Captain Chomp's portal popper-upper gets into the wrong hands. Portals and aliens begin popping up everywhere. // Fed up of everyone breaking the rules and making his life miserable, Ian declares a No Rules Day! Chaos ensues at the park.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Paramedic Power - When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zo. Zo has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zo has invited all of Peppa and Georges friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. Pancakeio - When Pancakeio the Pancake Wizard takes all the pancakes in Axle City, it's up to Blaze, Stripes, and Starla to become superheroes! Using their Super Wheels, they've got to get those pancakes back- just in time for breakfast!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep501
programme.desc: AJ to the Rescue - Blaze and AJ are racing through the jungle when Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud! Now it's up to AJ and his new animal friends, to go on an epic adventure to save Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The Trophy Chase - The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Doors Galore / No Rules Day - Captain Chomp's portal popper-upper gets into the wrong hands. Portals and aliens begin popping up everywhere. // Fed up of everyone breaking the rules and making his life miserable, Ian declares a No Rules Day! Chaos ensues at the park.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Pups Bear-ly Save Danny - Daring Danny X is at it again! This time hes stuck in a tree over a deep canyon and is pursued by hungry bears.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppas car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dogs garage isnt far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppas car back to his garage.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep142
programme.desc: The Vegetable Pie - Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save Rocket Ryder - The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Doors Galore / No Rules Day - Captain Chomp's portal popper-upper gets into the wrong hands. Portals and aliens begin popping up everywhere. // Fed up of everyone breaking the rules and making his life miserable, Ian declares a No Rules Day! Chaos ensues at the park.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep111
programme.desc: V.I.Peeved / Seor Class - Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Shrinking Stars / FitzPatrick - The Star family finds themselves getting smaller and smaller. // Patrick's evil twin cousin shows up to ruin Patrick' reputation.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep246
programme.desc: Plankton's Old Chum / Stormy Weather - Where Plankton usually dumps his rotten chum is too full, so he tricks SpongeBob into hiding it around the city. // SpongeBob befriends a small storm cloud, but has to protect it from a crazed weather man.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep247
programme.desc: Swamp Mates / One Trick Sponge - Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure. // SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he can't find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket / Squid's on a Bus - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer. // Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep205
programme.desc: Whirlybrains - SpongeBob and Patrick get hooked on the latest fad - flying your own brain like a tiny drone!

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep226
programme.desc: We Did A Bad Thing - When their secret identities gets out, Danger Force will stop at nothing to prevent their parents from finding out who is behind their masks.

programme.title: Danger Force S03 Ep301
programme.desc: The Force Returns Part 1 - The kids are living regular lives after leaving Danger Force, but when their moms go missing they have to reunite, along with Captain Man, in order to find them. They quickly discover that their moms and all the moms in Swellview have been kidnapped.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Goin Clubbin' / Totally Board - After beating Hugo at a game of Crazy Golf, Raj needs to find a way to get back in his good graces.// The death-defying day of skate is coming to town and Sammy finally has a chance to prove to Hugo that he's not 'Silly Sammy'.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Invader Dim / Getting Heated - Tara's pranks have gone too far and it's time for pay-back! // There's a heatwave and Sammy and Raj are over it. Luckily Sammy remembers he has two VIP passes to The Polar Palace!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Which Witch is Which? / Get Off My Lawnie - Bunny's mother visits from the old country. // Granny Tentacles gets her own spin-off show.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer / Pineapple RV - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long. // SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep247
programme.desc: Swamp Mates / One Trick Sponge - Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure. // SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he can't find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Blanchfield vs. Fiorot
programme.desc: Main Event - A flyweight title shot may be on the line at Atlantic Citys Boardwalk Hall on March 30 when New Jerseys own Erin Cold Blooded Blanchfield faces French sensation Manon Fiorot in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night. With a combined UFC record of 12-0, Blanchfield and Fiorot have been on a tear at 125 pounds, and with one more win in AC, a crack at the crown is expected to be next. Plus, Westwood native Vicente Luque continues on his quest to rule the welterweights when he battles highlight reel king Joaquin Buckley in what promises to be a memorable co-main event

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

With a combined UFC record of 12-0, Blanchfield and Fiorot have been on a tear at 125 pounds, and with one more win in AC, a crack at the crown is expected to be next. Plus, Westwood native Vicente Luque continues on his quest to rule the welterweights when he battles highlight reel king Joaquin Buckley in what promises to be a memorable co-main event

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Blanchfield vs. Fiorot

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep13
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep509BattlegroundsNextGenLiverpoolOriginsKhalilRountreeOnPointContenderSeries
programme.desc: We go inside the gym of British fan favorites Paddy Pimblett and Molly McCann and see the inner workings of the Next Gen team. The top graduates from DWCS share their experiences and thoughts on unique opportunity of competing on the show.
